column4: why doesn't "sudo apt-get dist-upgrade" upgrade GAIM to PIDGIN?

gthumb is pretty good for simple cropping and the like

are we talking about Eye of GNOME 2.18.1
but up to date, I've been using it for years
it actually looks pretty cool! How do I set it as the default image viewer?
you'd right click an image file, select properties at the bottom, and open with in the dialog window. Have to do it for each image type, though

it's not a 'gnome' app, so it's not released in sync. It's at 2.10.6 right now
